title: If you had to choose a Selena Gomez song, what would it be? What is the song about? Who was it written for? - Quora

response.answer_text: Rare ..cause the song is so special and beautiful..it talks about confidence..how we should all know that we are unique. Cause we are all rare..and we dont need another person to prove that…it was written for sel herself,and her selenators
